name: Intermission - an interval between parts of a play, film, or concert
name_original: Intermission - an interval between parts of a play, film, or concert
description:
Controls:

wasd/arrows = movement
E = equip/drop (note: do not equip more that one item at a time, it deletes the first one)
esc = pause
F = use item

This game was made for the 122 Mini jam, the theme was intermission and the restriction was "Losing is Good"

I chose to interpret the restriction as other people leave some of their stuff behind during the intermission (lose) and you steal those items to increase the amount of money (score) you have.
The play I used was made by Eric Coble and as far as I could see it said that it can be used.

Here is his website: http://ericcoble.com/

I finished a day early because I had other things that I had to do on the 25th and thus the game is a bit buggy and is unfinished. :( 

I forgot to add two of the characters

I hope this is atleast a decent 20-30 minutes of a game

I just want to say once again that the play is not my own, I found the play online and as far as I could tel it is allowed to be used for non commercial things, if it isn't allowed at all I'll remove the game. It was made by Eric Coble
